properties.title: New Life Church

properties.description: Open every Tuesday evening from 5pm - 8pm from 29th November to 31st January. Please note, we will not be open Tuesday 27th December. There is no need to book. Just turn up during this time and receive a warm welcome in a warm space. We will have our heating on, hot drinks at the ready, a hot meal for you to have and board games to play if you wish. Free wifi and power sockets for charging devices if needed.

properties.title: Oak Community Church

properties.description: Wednesday and Thursday 9.30am – 3.30pm. Free light refreshments, free wifi, free space to work or relax. Also on Saturdays, "The Lounge" is open 10am-2pm at the Church. The Lounge is free of charge for those in need. We warmly invite you to join us for a hot meal, refreshments, a warm space and some social activities. Get a hot shower; charge your mobile phone; use our computers; enjoy card games, board games and crafts. Familes and individuals - all welcome. Entrance is on The Drive. Bus routes nearby: 51, 358, 684, B14, R!, R3, R4, $5, R6, R8, R9, R10. Nearest station: Orpington. We have a small car park but may be busy.
